game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact and bring it back to the village elder.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a hidden city deep within the nearby forest, where an ancient civilization once thrived. The village elder has received a cryptic message that suggests the lost city holds the key to unlocking a powerful artifact. Your quest is to find this artifact and bring it back to the village.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces and a magical amulet granting resistance to fire

task.objective: Gather information about the lost city from the village's elderly residents.
task.description: Talk to the villagers and gather stories about the lost city. They may have valuable insights or clues that will aid you in your quest.

task.objective: Find the hidden entrance to the lost city.
task.description: Search the nearby forest for a hidden entrance to the lost city. Be wary of deadly traps and ferocious creatures that guard the ancient ruins.

task.objective: Retrieve the artifact from the heart of the lost city.
task.description: Navigate the treacherous tunnels and chambers of the lost city, avoiding deadly traps and battling fearsome creatures. The artifact lies at the very center of the ruins, guarded by a powerful entity.
